text: !!! is a dance band. Their name is usually said as 'Chk Chk Chk'. It can not be searched for on Google unless it is written like that. They started in 1996 in Sacramento, California. They have released five albums. Nic Offer is the singer. !!!'s fifth album, THR!!!ER, was released on April 29 2013. == History == The band's first album '!!! was released in 2001 on Gold Standard Laboratories. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2000s American music groups Category:1996 establishments in California
